comment._content: Drawn by Jerome Myers, father of Virginia Myers: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8498278440] en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerome_Myers en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beatrice_Wood

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for bringing our attention to the artist's name written on the portrait.  We will include it in the description next time we update.
